"A.P.241/9/23/14:30":
"Let's review the situation.
Xiera, give us the status of
the black hole and a simulation
of its current expansion rate."

"Ok! I will display them on the
monitor."

"This is the black hole that
appeared at the same time as
<%me>'s brief disappearance."

"Using our information as a base,
this is our result, using the
Florenberg Black Hole Equation."

"Everything is being devoured,
the universe is growing dark..."

"Our current understanding of black
holes do not expand like this.
Something is very wrong."
"Alma, you said you were like a soul to the Akashic Record."

"And no doubt that you were the one
to return <%me> to here."

"<%me>'s pattern came from
the black hole."

"If that's the case, then it would make
sense that you were able to cross
between here and from within the black hole."

"Now tell me...
What's inside that place?
Where does the black hole lead to?"

"You already know the answer, Xiao.
Only one possible thing lies in there."

"The original place where Xion once
resided. The birthplace of the
universe. A place born the same time
the universe was."
"It's the Akashic Record itself."

"As for the planet <%me> ended up on.
Let's call it Omega, for now."

"Now see, Omega, is a world born from
the records recorded by the Akashic
Record. It's the embodiment of said records."

"Would it be easier to understand that
the Akashic Record is having a dream,
and that dream is that world?"
"Embodiment of records...?"

"Don't tell me the series of conflicts
that took place on Earth; Is Ether
causing this?"

"It's a possibility...
Photons are connected to the Akashic
Record after all."

"The Photons that ended up staying on
Earth, mixing with the mutated Ether...
Everything started to get strange after
that."

"Is the Akashic Record refering to
Xion? But she's no longer...?"
"Hmm, there's a misunderstanding here."

"Xion is Xion.
The Akashic Record is the
Akashic Record."

"While true that with Xion's death,
there's no longer an entity that can
interface with the Akashic Record."

"However, the Akashic Record is still
there. No one can see it, but it's
still there nevertheless.
The universe continues to record
everything."

"Erm, if we were to make an analogy,
would it be ok to say that the
Akashic Record is a library and Xion
was the librarian?"

"Oooh! You got it!
That works just fine!"

"While there's no one to maintain it,
the library is still there."

"The Akashic Record cannot be
accessed normally."
"However, the Akashic Record has become a single world; Omega."

"The [Profound Darkness] has
transported and fused itself
with the Akashic Record."

"Thus, that black hole is the
result. Swallowing the universe
while it continues to expand."

"What you're seeing is the conversion
of the records into dreams."
"The Akashic Record is no exception."

"But that dream has taken a form.
Now, that would be great if that was all, but something vile has entered as well."

"If left unchecked, everything will
be consumed by the encroaching
darkness. The past, the present,
everything."
"That's why I've come here."

"While I am someone who no longer
exists, I've desired to see the
future in which Xion and everyone
else worked so hard to create."
